resources.string: This is the login view. Here the users will be able to introduce their login information\n or login with some social network

This view contains the music library. From this view the user may do the following:

 1. Click on a song, playlist or album and reproduce it
 2. Buy a song
 3. View what's being reproduced
 4. Access the music map

This view contains the song currently being reproduced.\n Here the user may return to the library either by going back or by clicking on details from the song being reproduced.\ The user may also access the music map to view areas where this song is being reproduced.
